TopicTitle: StackOverflowException: The requested operation caused a stack overflow.

Articles.Content:
I just started getting this weird bug where stack separators, even though they are on the same stage, are not activating simultaneously. Also, the fuel lines are not breaking, instead they stay connected and get *really*  *long.*

*I've tried rebuilding the ship and reloading the save, to no avail.*

*Any thoughts or insight?*

Well this seems like a game issue/Huge game breaking bug and not a one time thing. 

1. Try to exit game and re-enter

2. Try to exit KSP and re-enter

3. Restart your PC and re-enter

4. Re install Your KSP

If that doesn't work I don't know what will

I've come across that in the past, I believe Claw has included a fix in his Stock Bugfix Modules

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v1-0-2-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-%28Release-v1-0-2d-3-18-May-15%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v1-0-2-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-%28Release-v1-0-2d-3-18-May-15%29)

> 
> Well this seems like a game issue/Huge game breaking bug and not a one time thing. 
> 1. Try to exit game and re-enter
> 
> 2. Try to exit KSP and re-enter
> 
> 3. Restart your PC and re-enter
> 
> 4. Re install Your KSP
> 
> If that doesn't work I don't know what will

A restart did the trick. Thanks for the assist.

> 
> A restart did the trick. Thanks for the assist.

 NP dude. Have fun
